snippet: Carla Smits-Nusteling, KPN's chief financial officer, disagreed with a decision to quadruple the top management board to 12 members from three, the company said.
abstract: KPN chief financial officer Carla Smits-Nusteling resigns following management reorganization of the Dutch company; cites a dispute over the decision to quadruple the board to 12 members from three.
lead_paragraph: Carla Smits-Nusteling, KPN's chief financial officer, disagreed with a decision to quadruple the top management board to 12 members from three, the company said.

headline.seo: Dutch Executive Quits in Governance Dispute
headline.main: Dutch Firm’s Finance Officer Quits After Reorganization
headline.print_headline: Dutch Firm’s Finance Officer Quits After Reorganization
